attributes.action: Ask the government to act to condemn the actions of Donald Trump.
attributes.additional_details: His actions are divisive and increase the risk of violence around the world. We call upon the government not to stay silent as many did with previous tyrants but to act in every substantive way possible to reduce the risk he poses to the world. As a world leader the Government of the United Kingdom has sufficient power to act and influence the outcome of proceedings.
attributes.background: Donald trump has as President of the United States of America acted to incite violence and create deeper hatred and division in his executive orders to build a wall bordering Mexico and by excluding Muslims from entering the country.
